website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty speed ladder with flat rungs to minimize the chance of tripping.
pros: Flat rungs that won't trip you up when stepping over them
Thick nylon straps and durable plastic rungs
Holds up well over rigorous use
cons: A few have said that the straps have arrived twisted so the ladder does not lay flat

customer_reviews.title: Onwards via your feet!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made sadder: 13 nicely spaced rungs, easy to fold, easy to untangle, which does happen. I've used it so far on hard surfaces only and clearly it's been beneficial for balance and footwork at speed. There is a learning drill for the many moves reviewable on the internet so one can pick and choose for your sport. I like combining it with my home weight program as variety is fun and engaging. No question that my tennis footwork will bet even better with its,regular usage. I would buy this again without hesitation. Regards. Catus.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus Ken

customer_reviews.title: I like this product in theory and was convinced in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product in theory and was convinced in the video although it has a tendency to get unsnapped. Also, the product has a nice bag, but it's a pain to get it back in there and the bag is huge - not super portable if you keep your equipment in the car like I do for my training job. If you can keep it down, it's much nicer to use. Additionally, keep in mind for the ladder component it's only 5 boxes, which is not a lot to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: The second dies a horribly dead the very first time a player stepped on ...
customer_reviews.text: SKLZ typically makes genuinely innovative products. Just not this one. A complete engineering redesign is needed here. I purchased two of the "Pro" series ladders along with their regular ones. One Pro ladder arrived broken. The box did not exhibit external damage so I'm going to say it didn't happen during transit. The second dies a horribly dead the very first time a player stepped on the rung during a workout. The ladder becomes useless as soon as the scissor part is broken. Sorry SKLZ - back to the drawing board with this one.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: So much that I'm ordering another! Have used it ...
customer_reviews.text: So much that I'm ordering another! Have used it primarily indoor and it has expanded my ability to offer agility training in my in-home training sessions (as long as there's room). Has helped reinforce to my elder-client to pick up her feet when she's walking (if she missteps the ladder move, rather than just hearing me say it) - so that's a bonus in itself. NOTE: While I am counting the ladder moving as a bonus in this instance (it's in a private training application and controlled environment), there is a non-slip version of this ladder for indoor application.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: My son plays soccer and likes to train at home or go out to fields and train with a teammate. He carries this ladder without any problems! He folds it and brings it along with him without complaining of being heavy or too big and it is the right size to complete his training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both teams loved it and we saw the results on the field
customer_reviews.text: Used this for our U14 and U12 soccer team to work on speed and foot work. Both teams loved it and we saw the results on the field. Have also been using it for our 6th grade basketball team. Only problem is that it is constantly moving since it is designed to be used outdoors with the pins to go into the ground. It doesn't have anything to stick to a basketball court. I bought it for my soccer teams so I am still going to give it 5 stars because it works great for them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder. We use indoor and out for softball ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Ladder. We use indoor and out for softball conditioning. Note to those complaining they got 'twisted' ones: if the ladder gets folded in transit it will have a 'twisted' line. Just fold the ladder portion into itself where this occurs and you can fix it yourself. Its not a quality control or defect in manufacturing....
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Lighter duty than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little ladder for agility workouts. It is very cost effective but doesn't seem to be very sturdy and also seems slightly smaller than most. If you want inexpensive, this is your ladder...if looking for durability, look at another.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Rutter

customer_reviews.title: The agility ladder you should buy
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded expectations for the cost. I've seen a lot of very flimsy agility ladders, but this is not one of them. It folds up nicely, never gets tangled, has a great storage pouch and the rungs are heavy duty enough that it doesnt get messed up when you step on them. Ive used it 3 times with a group of 7 people and it's been awesome everytime. Highly recommend, zero complaints. Cant imagine how a more expensive ladder could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Matt J

customer_reviews.title: I'm not happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy with this, I bought 2 for me and my brother. 1 came good the other one was all twisted, I thought I could handle it, that it was not a big deal, but it's really messing up my workouts. The ladder won't stay flat on the ground, and because of that I trip every time I use it, the squares are not the same size like the other one! I'm really not happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Agility ladder works for all ages
customer_reviews.text: There is a nice video in the packet. I used this for my 6/7 year old flag football team. They absolutely loved the drills. It was a way to change up the practice. The only reason I did not give this a 5 star was because the stakes are pretty cheap and bent on the first time I put into the ground. If you do NOT stake down the latter well, kids will trip while trying to get through the ladder. Only other advice is to pull the ladder taught when inserting the stakes. Other than that, I did see a pick up in form and speed through the season.
customer_reviews.author: Al Augustine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Easy to use and move. I follow the suggested work outs that were included and I really like it. I can use this in my basement, my garage or outside !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Lambrecht

customer_reviews.title: This unit is good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This unit is good for the price, but don't expect something you'd expect to find in a commercial gym. No complaints over the size and functionality of the ladder, I was just expecting something heavier duty. It's sort of like comparing Marcy free weight equipment to Hammer Strength. In summary, the price is fair for the quality, but the previous reviews led me to think I'd be getting something of commercial quality, and it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: My oldest son played college football and is now training his younger siblings for the upcoming football season. The price was very reasonable so I had my son look at it and he indicated it would meet the needs. When the package arrived my son opened it and was very impressed with the product. He indicated it was longer than others he had seen which was nice, it came with anchors to hold it down which he had never seen and the case was a nice bonus as well. They used it last week and he had nothing but good things to say about it. Will post again at the end of the season re. durability.
customer_reviews.author: David Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome concept!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good product! I just wish it were a little easier to fold. It’s still super easy to fold once you’ve gotten the hang of it and I love how easily you can change the product from a ladder to hurdles.
customer_reviews.author: Bochito Arroyo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price if a regular user
customer_reviews.text: I use these frequently for agility sessions for all age groups. They are much easier to set up and put away than the cheaper option and if a player catches the ladder it doesn't need to be straightened out as it keeps the shape pretty well. I have also found it to be more durable than the cheaper options. If it is something you are using regularly then worth paying for it.
customer_reviews.author: craig kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after trying a similar one in addition to my workouts at my gym. This is perfect for those who are training either sports or want to diversify workouts. I am a female and feel that this has been a great addition to my home gym on the days I have to stay at home with a sick kiddo and can't make it to my gym. It is also greatly priced and my 4 year old also liked to try it out with me! The DVD included was also cool to see other moves you can do with the ladder. Overall, I use indoors, but it has outdoor capabilities with stakes that are included. Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Margarite H

customer_reviews.title: Great deal at a Small Price
customer_reviews.text: Frankly, for the price I expected it would not be very durable. OMG, I was wrong. It was better than the more costly one I replaced. As a traveling Personal Trainer, the included case was a bonus. I forgot about the DVD until it arrive and found it to be helpful and a reminder regarding technique. If you plan to use strictly indoors, I suggest you completely spread out flat for a few days (3 tops) to unfold the nylon side straps. There is no need to do so if you are using outdoors. The ladder comes with ground spikes. Be healthy, be happy:-)
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely much better than the previous one I tried. Not as nice as the one my first trainer had, but i'm sure not nearly as expensive. My only reason for not giving 5 stars is I wish the straps were a little better. They can crease and then they don't lay perfectly flat without the stakes. Otherwise I'm loving this product. I take it to the gym since my gym doesn't have one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cerruto

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for improving foot speed agility.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Great tool for foot speed/agility. I use this for footwork drills for my son for youth soccer and youth football.
customer_reviews.author: knuk 36

customer_reviews.title: Good Drill ladder
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is great and it folds up really easily. Easy to set up and easy to take down my only hang up is the stakes used to hold the ladder down are not very durable and the first one we put in the ground bent. So we have already had to replace all 4 stackes but the ladder integrity itself seems to hold up really well
customer_reviews.author: Max Bush

customer_reviews.title: really nice speed ladder
customer_reviews.text: really nice speed ladder. The hole at the center of the first and last rungs are great. I can stack the ladder down with those holes and spend less time adjusting the ladder when one of my players snags the ladder with their foot.
customer_reviews.author: sccrwshngtn

customer_reviews.title: Great for workout but came with defect
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Easy to unpack but more importantly easy to pack again. great for a workout. Lightweight without flying away at any misstep. Con: On ladder somehow one part has been stiched the wrong way making that part not flat on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Grinda

customer_reviews.title: Great agility tool
customer_reviews.text: Easily accessible. Fun to use for agility. Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome! You can use it elevated or flat. It also comes with a carrying bag so you can literally just take it to a park or where ever! Easy to put together and take apart as well. You can also customize the type of workout you want to do by snapping in all the slats or just use one or two for bigger jumps.
customer_reviews.author: Kat S.

customer_reviews.title: Great agility ladder
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our training facility. Cost was less than purchasing at a local store. Very durable and rungs are in place so there is no assembly required.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ladder about a year ago. I keep it in my car for on the go workouts with friends and its great in the grass, concrete, or living room floor. The bag it comes with and hooks for staking in the ground are perfect. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laina Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Needed one of these for my son once Quarantine started. It’s Skillz, it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted to add this to her exercise routine.
customer_reviews.author: JUDY ABRAMS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speed Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loves it and all SKILZ training products i have purchased for him.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: 1st use: used this for training my U-10 boys soccer team for preparation for playoffs. The construction of the ladder seems sturdy enough. Easy to unroll and anchor into the ground with the 4 metal anchors. The kids stepped all over the yellow plastic ladders; the yellow plastic didn't break from all the cleats stepping on them. When the practice was over, I simply rolled it up and put it back in the nicely oversized bag it came in. So far so good! More to come...
customer_reviews.author: GruntledMalcontent

customer_reviews.title: Great for classes
customer_reviews.text: I coach CrossFit classes, so I use this indoors. The members enjoy it because it's something different and challenging to do as part of their warm up. I enjoy it because it gives me a chance to coach something different than your normal "fitness" moves. I like the the yellow bars are sewn into place so they won't slide up and down the nylon strap. I bought two and they both fit into one carry bag that they come with.
customer_reviews.author: DancerNinja

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this cheaply made product
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Thought with how expensive the product was that it would be made with better materials. We had barely used it when one of the rungs broke. A short time later a second rung broke. We tried to contact the company to advise them of the same and we could not find a way to contact them. DO NOT buy this product. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Little light...
customer_reviews.text: Therefore, it moves around to easily - otherwise, a rather solid performer. Serves its purpose well for our needs. Providing 4-stars vs. 5-stars because the slightest hit, its rats you out by moving around, subsequently requiring more adjustment time then ultimately desired. I guess if we never accidentally hit it, then we'd be just fine and would give it 5 stars =) A good buy, at reasonable cost, nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Hebert

customer_reviews.title: easy to travel with
customer_reviews.text: I took this with me on trips internationally and domestic so I could do HIIT workouts on the road. It's great! Sturdy, wipes down easily, dried quickly when used in the rain or on grass. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Reb

customer_reviews.title: Great training ladder
customer_reviews.text: I coach soccer and this is a great product for conditioning. When it is staked, it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Bfore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length for at-home use
customer_reviews.text: My 15-year old loves this! He asked for an agility ladder to use in the garage during the cold months for part of his soccer training. It's not as long as the ones he uses with his team, but it's perfect for at-home use.
customer_reviews.author: Connie A

customer_reviews.title: Kicking my sons butt :)
customer_reviews.text: We now own 2 of these SKLZ ladders and I get to use them to kick my sons' butt. My son is a national level baseball player in middle school and we have been using the SKLZ ladder for offseason and inseason conditioning and agility improvement for several years now. Decent construction. Low profile. Small and not super long like other brands so easier to set up, take down and store.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: It is good quality. The problem I had was with regard ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the stairs combo discs. With respect to the material no complaints . It is good quality . The problem I had was with regard to packing . Since placed in a box that could hold 3 times as covering these 2 products and therefore shipping to Venezuela was too high. Should be more aware when they are packing shipments abroad . That's the reason I give it 4 stars and not 5 .
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Mireles

customer_reviews.title: A+ agility
customer_reviews.text: This agility ladder performs as expected. Product is well built and and easy to use. I have several young students that use this product several times a week. This ladder is used outdoors and has held up very well for the last few months.
customer_reviews.author: Maximums Decimus Arrelius

customer_reviews.title: How Bad Do You Want It?
customer_reviews.text: Go to Youtube, watch the above video, and you will click and order, too. Workout equipment is best when it is simple, and this product is well-made and gets the job done. Some reviews complained that there were no stakes to hold the ladder in place, but they were included. I don't know if the company was receptive to feedback and added them, or if the other reviewer was mistaken. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Go Bucs Go Rays

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for learning footwork
customer_reviews.text: Good ladder for basic use. Comes with a nice little instructional guide too. Me and two other coaches bought these and we all are happy. They are definitely good for the kids to use to work on footwork and they seem to learn quick using this.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Good for cardio
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to a cardio workout. Just lay it on the ground and do the workouts provided in the instruction manuals (or find some online) and you will notice a quick boost to your heart rate.
customer_reviews.author: John Francis

customer_reviews.title: Have tried using this indoors, but it is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Have tried using this indoors, but it is not very satisfactory, because it moves every time it is touched. Looking forward to warmer weather so that it can be used outside, where it will be held in place.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Works for training!
customer_reviews.text: I am a personal trainer and bought this to take with me when I meet with individual clients. It's handy and comes in a nice bag that is compact and easy to carry. The reason I gave it only four stars is because it has a twist in the rope and was sewn that way so it can't lie completely flat when laying on the ground. No big deal really but it would just look nice if it were flat because that is how it was meant to be. Quality is great for the price paid!
customer_reviews.author: Pammiek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Exactly what I expected. I use this with my daughter to work on speed exercises. Great way for us to bond and have some fun, while getting in some exercise. Folds up and stores easily in the bag. Secures easily with the stakes, but also works great on the sidewalk .
customer_reviews.author: Adam C Dahlheim

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, as a 5th grade basketball coach, use it to work on agility and footwork drills for my team. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Marco Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Use it in my studio and the only precaution is that it moves easily if not secured down
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on schedule. Use it in my studio and the only precaution is that it moves easily if not secured down. I have it on the carpeted portion of the floor so that was better than on the wooden floor. I look forward to taking it outside and using the hooks to secure it into the ground when weather is warmer.
customer_reviews.author: KarenWi

customer_reviews.title: Portable and great exercise
customer_reviews.text: Easy to open and work out with. Comes with a dvd to give you ideas. Then you just fold up and put back in the bag it comes with. My husband uses it with his grade school athletics department and those kiddos have their parent's buying it for them as well. It could be even better if it came with a print out of ideas as well. 5 stars for getting off our butts and doing something and it's portable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great agility ladder. I'm a personal trainer, i use this for several of my clients to get a little feet coordination. works great. sometimes it can get a little tangled, but does come with a nice carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Good ladder does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this agility ladder for 3 1/2 years now and it has taken a beating. I used and use with for footwork drills from kids who range from 5 to 10 years of age. Can't complain much about it at all and the price was well.
customer_reviews.author: ikonkar

customer_reviews.title: SKLZ Collapsible Ladders
customer_reviews.text: I use these ladders for soccer, football, speed training and agility. Stronger spikes would be great to hold the ladders in place. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: LAMONT H. THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Good, takes up space
customer_reviews.text: It's huge yet flat when broke down. Its not like a easy fold up. You break it down like a tent pole. Great for multi purpose ladder workouts!!
customer_reviews.author: Jed Crossman

customer_reviews.title: Backyard drills for my boys
customer_reviews.text: Works great for us. Bought this for my boys, ages 8 & 11, for backyard workout drills for football and speed and agility. Stores easily, easy to set up. No complaints, would recommend. *ours was twisted in one spot as well. Not a huge deal, but thought I'd mention it as someone also mention theirs being twisted in a spot/section. Doesn't affect the use or purpose though.
customer_reviews.author: karen holton

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the SKLZ Agility Ladder. It was just what I expected. I thought it was a good price for the product. Wish it came in a 50' ladder. The rungs stay in place and you also have the opportunity to stabilize it with the included hardware. I love the bag that is included. It is not cloth which is great. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: and a good length to practice agility drills
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. It's well made, and a good length to practice agility drills. Have used it on turf, grass, and concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I can already feel the looseness when I'm out on that field running, this thing is helping me so much with my agility! Comes with a nice carrying case! Very fast to set up and put away
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice ladder and at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: I've owned it for nearly a year now, and I noticed it on the cyber weekend deal list. It really is worth the money. It's a nice ladder and at a nice price. If you would like an agility ladder, this is a great one to have.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Insanity Asylum
customer_reviews.text: Me And my sister are are working out with the insanity plan and now we are going to start the Asylum. I bought this for my sister as a present, And guess what, this brought twice the squares plus one, (11) you need 5 to insanity, so we cut it in half and now we both have agility lather. Good material, it includes nice a carry bag. I'm proud of what a bought.
customer_reviews.author: Omar E. Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for working on your agility. well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Roy M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SKLZ has great products and this ladder is no different. Perfect for whats needed.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Price is Great - Quality is Great
customer_reviews.text: Found similar item at local sporting goods store for $50 plus. Ordered this one and it turned out to be the same quality and size as the $50 one. Grandsons have used it a lot and it is holding up extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Came apart disappointment
customer_reviews.text: My son used this product one time and the mesh inside material came apart it was after more than 5 days of receiving so unable to send back
customer_reviews.author: Alexander W. Stick

customer_reviews.title: Agility Ladder
customer_reviews.text: For athletes who need to work on their agility, this ladder is perfect. It works on field surfaces or solid surfaces...
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Received a lemon.
customer_reviews.text: So I open the package to find the black banding connecting the ladders is twisted on 2 rungs on the end. It was sewn on there in the manufacturing so I can't fix it. Seems like a reputable brand, so I'm going to return it and hope it was just an oversight or something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, Great for footwork/agility drills
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be durable, and comes with stakes and bag all for a good price. I use it for my soccer team and I'm sure it would also work for football, basketball or other sports.
customer_reviews.author: KHR

customer_reviews.title: I thought they would hate doing the drills
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters volleyball team to improve foot speed. I thought they would hate doing the drills, turns out it was the best part of practice. I am 40+ and also use this to improve my hockey footwork... I love competing with my daughters with time and accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D16

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to carry around
customer_reviews.text: Helps me and my son stay in tip top shape. I am over 40 and he is in all kinds of sports. It is very easy to carry around. I am thinking of using it with some of my other gear to form a boot camp. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D.

customer_reviews.title: The ladder is of good quality and lays flat nicely on the court
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my tennis students (jr & senior high). The ladder is of good quality and lays flat nicely on the court. Very satisfactory. Kids like working with it. I just purchased one ladder, but I should have two, so that we have a longer distance to traverse.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Macy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't pass up the great price on this product. Very sturdy and holds up well, after a season of use with 11 yr olds. Getting pulled, stepped on, pull on all different directions, and still holding up for next season. Would have given a 5 star but the short stakes that come with this product don't hold up well. I replaced stakes with longer and thicker camping stakes, and that seemed to solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: jcm217

customer_reviews.title: untangle and enjoy. kids have used this a lot and it ...
customer_reviews.text: yes it comes tangled but its not a big deal, untangle and enjoy. kids have used this a lot and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: slcmd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect workout!
customer_reviews.text: We are currently using this on our cement basement floor. It has great spacing and is durable enough to take the weight placed on it without cracking or coming apart! Will probably order a second one, since our teenagers fuss over taking turns.
customer_reviews.author: YA

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control on quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple enough product, as stated in other posts my ladder came with the nylon strap twisted on both sides for the first rung only. Its not worth the hassle to return but I wonder how hard is it to make sure that the straps are sewn properly on this product? fortunately its symmetrical and doesn't really effect the purpose of the ladder, The ladder seems sturdy for years of use so you wonder why they can't get it right
customer_reviews.author: Roy Duke, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Theoretically, I would use this to do lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: Theoretically, I would use this to do lots of agility training to make me quicker on the court. They even include a bunch of exercises! In reality, sitting on the couch is a whole lot less work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and comes with a bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic agility ladder, it lays flat on the ground, and folds nicely. My son likes the DVD that came with it, and uses it to work on his agility for soccer. And, it comes with a storage bag, which is good so other things don't get tangled with it. A good purchase, that's a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is a huge help when working on balance, footwork, and speed. I mainly purchased it for my Youth Football team and they seem to love it. By the second day their footwork was much improved. Mentally its challenging for them but, it helps them body control. Im very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: carlos muniz

customer_reviews.title: They fold / unfold easily and store nice in the bag
customer_reviews.text: Not too much to these. They are as advertised and work well. They fold / unfold easily and store nice in the bag. Great for at home in my basement or out in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: tough product
customer_reviews.text: The yellow plastic bars seem tough. Nylon constructed straps. Doesn't seem like I'm gonna wear this out soon. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Jovan Roetz

customer_reviews.title: Speed ladder
customer_reviews.text: Owned 2 sets for a year now, work well. Well made, no signs of wear, use them heavily with my U12 and U14 boys soccer teams. A little short for the older boys, but you can always tie 2 ladders together if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Soccerguy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boys to train with for football. Helps with their footwork and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: My guys love using this ladder
customer_reviews.text: My guys love using this ladder. This ladder is has high viability and can be easily seen using your peripheral vision. Along with the ground spikes, it helps my athletes focus more on the drills and technique than looking down to make sure they don't trip on the rungs.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Albert Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Long rope ladder. It came with instructional DVDs that I have yet to look at but the quality of the rope ladder is good and sturdy. When I first started to use it I would step on the rungs and they would not break. I would recommend it to anyone wanting to increase their agility and/or speed.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Patnugot

customer_reviews.title: It's a good source for training when you leave the gym behind
customer_reviews.text: I use it to take it to the woods for rock climbing training, to keep myself up to speed. It's a good source for training when you leave the gym behind. It's well made and very easy to carry wherever you wish to take it.
customer_reviews.author: mgmgilbert

customer_reviews.title: Works great, perfect for catchers
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a very helpful training aid. We use it for our baseball team catcher drills. Helps build up their leg strength and conditioning
customer_reviews.author: ShopsTooMuch

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Got it out of the box and put it together quick. It was ready to use right away.
customer_reviews.author: TAO

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good ladder for the price. I only use this indoors on a hard floor. Would prefer that it lay flatter than it does. I have used a more expensive brand which lays flat when unpacked.
customer_reviews.author: cjo

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Easy to setup and take down and the carry case is great. Used it today for our under 8 soccer team to increase agility and they loved it. Order shipped on time and in great condition
customer_reviews.author: Christopher King

customer_reviews.title: Versital peice of gear
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is very reasonably priced. A great addition to a fitness regime that looks to improve athletic abillity, easy to use lots of drills and tangible improvements come very quickly. Helpfull for all sports with just a few minutes a week.
customer_reviews.author: Alan J. Parent

customer_reviews.title: I like to play a lot of sports like football
customer_reviews.text: I like to play a lot of sports like football, volleyball, and tennis. I have to say this really helped me in my footwork for all the sports i play and it's great for condition drills too.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: New home workout regime
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these at my gym and the quality of this SKLZ ladder is excellent - equals that of the gym. (Is it the same?) It comes with a handy carrying bag that makes storage quick. The ladder lies down very flat and is easy to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: use it for Insanity/track workouts
customer_reviews.text: love this! we bought it to use during Insanity Asylum workouts (from Beachbody) and it's long enough for my husband and I to use at once layed out all the way. It's held up (we've had it for a few months) and we haven't had any problems. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: quackie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: No doubt this is the best product out there. I use it as part of my run training program. The size of the rungs are perfect not too small. Quality is tops. I like the fact that it can with stakes to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: tiburon

customer_reviews.title: not a strong product
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my baseball team, 12U boys. this product broke with in four weeks of training 3 days a week. cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: vinny

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son for his birthday. Had a homemade one out of paracord, but he wanted something better. This does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy St. Aug

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Durable, long lasting, as a certified Personal Trainer this is a must have for training athletes of any level! it will help fine tune your programs and open up many more doors to train clients!!! love it!
customer_reviews.author: seraph1919

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do, and does it well.
customer_reviews.text: My wife trips a lot. This is to help her gate and lift her legs higher. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: redhead

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised as I was replacing an older ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tapp

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I use it for my kids soccer
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it for my kids soccer, football, baseball, volleyball training. I use t his for agility and quick feet. The kids love it and it's a quick setup and roll it up when you're finished. Plus it comes in a cool carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Keyzers

customer_reviews.title: My son of 9 love this ladder
customer_reviews.text: My son of 9 love this ladder. It is slim.so it can be used by kids and adults... other skill ladders are too wide for kids... this one is just perfect...
customer_reviews.author: RCArends

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Simple to fold up and use and the bag is big enough to easily fit the ladder into it. I have multiple SKLZ products, most of which are great and this is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: MikeG

product_meta.title: SKLZ Speed and Agility Ladder
feature_bullets: Improve acceleration, lateral speed and change of direction
Improve quickness through accelerated foot strike and lift frequency
Develop the core skills necessary to enhance balance, rhythm and body control
11 heavy duty plastic rungs measuring 17" wide and 15' long
Includes carry bag for easy portability
